    • Method Detail

      • deleteDirectories

        public static Action<Task> deleteDirectories(Object... directories)
        Returns an action that will delete the specified directories. The directories can be of type File, Path, Directory or any deferred types of previous types.
        Parameters:
        directories - the directories to delete when executing the action.
        Returns:
        an action that deletes the specified directories when executed.
        See Also:
        DeferredUtils

      • deleteDirectories

        public static Action<Task> deleteDirectories(Iterable<Object> directories)
        Returns an action that will delete the specified directories. The directories can be of type File, Path, Directory or any deferred types of previous types.
        Parameters:
        directories - the directories to delete when executing the action.
        Returns:
        an action that deletes the specified directories when executed.
        See Also:
        DeferredUtils

      • assertTrue

        public static Action<Task> assertTrue(Supplier<Boolean> expression,
                                      Object errorMessage)
        Assert the supplied expression is true as a Task action. The expression will be evaluated only once when the task action will be executed.
        Parameters:
        expression - expression to assert true
        errorMessage - error message to include in the exception
        Returns:
        an action that assert the specified expression is true or else it will throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the expression is false.
